A0: Ahmedabad : The BJP Legislature Party in Gujarat
RelatedSentence: Ahmedabad : The BJP Legislature Party in Gujarat will meet here on May 21 to elect its new leader to replace Chief Minister Narendra Modi , who is all set to be the country 's next Prime Minister .
Modi became the chief minister for the first time on October 7 , 2001 and won three consecutive terms .
He is also scheduled to address a rally on May 20 in Maninagar , his Assembly constituency .
